subtitle: Chapter five contradiction between our
life and our Christian conscience
there are many reason why Christ's

which had been manifested another reason

consciously absorb it unconsciously it

individuals if the father of a family

his child's conception of life life

necessity of abandoning the pagan

Christian theory of life and this time

ago
passed through the transition from the
